key.name: transition-speed
key.description: How fast the panel fades in and out.

key.name: maximized-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the panel when there are maximized windows.

key.name: unmaximized-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the panel when there are no maximized windows.

key.name: hide-corners
key.description: Hides the rounded corners of the panel. (improves fade aesthetic)

key.name: force-animation
key.description: Overrides 'gtk-enable-animations' on installations where animations are disabled.
